alert.note: Alert for Ocean (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 1:25PM EDT until June 16 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...THE TORNADO WARNING FOR NORTHWESTERN OCEAN COUNTY WILL EXPIRE AT 130 PM EDT... The storm which prompted the warning has weakened below severe limits, and no longer appears capable of producing a tornado. Therefore, the warning will be allowed to expire. However hail and gusty winds are still possible with this thunderstorm. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EDT for southern New Jersey. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service Mount Holly NJ. Remember, a Severe Thunderstorm Warning still remains in effect for Ocean county until 2:15 PM EDT.
